content.p: Byron 200 Lecture event banner This one hour free session will involve a gentle stroll around some of the landmarks on site, listening to new tracks that have been created for the Hidden Heritage sound walk and capturing views that inspire. Take time to stop and look carefully at what surrounds us, enjoy the outdoors and create something to take home that marks this moment in time. This activity is aimed at adults and will involve the use of simple art tools. All materials will be provided, no previous experience required. There are two walks available at following times: 10.30-11.30 13.00-14.00 University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD t: +44 (0) 115 951 5151 e: theinstitute@nottingham.ac.uk
